external_references.description: UK National Cyber Security Center et al. (2024, February). SVR cyber actors adapt tactics for initial cloud access. Retrieved March 1, 2024.

description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) targets dormant or inactive user accounts, accounts belonging to individuals no longer at the organization but whose accounts remain on the system, for access and persistence.(Citation: NCSC et al APT29 2024)
